title: Olivia Newton-John: ‘I've been friends with my cancer for years... but now I’ve asked it to leave’
text:
Olivia Newton-John is telling me why she was going to turn down Grease. “There were a couple of reasons why I didn’t want to do it,” explains the 71-year-old. “I’d just made a movie that was a total disaster, and didn’t want to jeopardise a musical career that was taking off by making another bad film. Oh, and I was worried that I was too old.”

Throwing back her tousled blonde head, the Australian actress bursts out laughing. “I was 29 – and convinced I was way too old to be playing a 17-year-old. Of course, now I look back and think: ‘What was I worried about?’”

Joyous incredulity seems to be Newton-John’s default emotion today. Which makes sense. After all we’re sitting in Julien’s Auction...
description: Olivia Newton-John is telling me why she was going to turn down Grease.
